jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy module¶

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.iterative(u_geos: ndarray | MaskedArray, v_geos: ndarray | MaskedArray, lat_u: ndarray | MaskedArray, lat_v: ndarray | MaskedArray, lon_u: ndarray | MaskedArray, lon_v: ndarray | MaskedArray, coriolis_factor_u: ndarray | MaskedArray, coriolis_factor_v: ndarray | MaskedArray, n_it: int = 100, eps: float = 0.0001) → Tuple[ndarray | MaskedArray, ndarray | MaskedArray]¶

Computes velocities from cyclogeostrophic approximation using the iterative method from Penven et al. (2014)

Parameters:

  • u_geos (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U geostrophic velocity value

  • v_geos (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V geostrophic velocity value

  • lat_u (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U latitude

  • lat_v (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V latitude

  • lon_u (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U longitude

  • lon_v (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V longitude

  • coriolis_factor_u (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U Coriolis factor

  • coriolis_factor_v (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V Coriolis factor

  • n_it (int, optional) – maximum number of iterations, defaults to N_IT_IT

  • eps (float, optional) – residual tolerance, defaults to EPSILON_IT

Returns:

U and V cyclogeostrophic velocities

Return type:

Tuple[Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray], Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]]

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.variational(u_geos: ndarray | MaskedArray, v_geos: ndarray | MaskedArray, dx_u: ndarray, dx_v: ndarray, dy_u: ndarray, dy_v: ndarray, coriolis_factor_u: ndarray | MaskedArray, coriolis_factor_v: ndarray | MaskedArray, n_it: int = 2000, lr: float = 0.005) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray]¶

Computes the cyclogeostrophic balance using the variational method

Parameters:

  • u_geos (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U geostrophic velocity value

  • v_geos (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V geostrophic velocity value

  • dx_u (np.ndarray) – U spatial step along x

  • dx_v (np.ndarray) – V spatial step along x

  • dy_u (np.ndarray) – U spatial step along y

  • dy_v (np.ndarray) – V spatial step along y

  • coriolis_factor_u (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – U Coriolis factor

  • coriolis_factor_v (Union[np.ndarray, np.ma.MaskedArray]) – V Coriolis factor

  • n_it (int, optional) – maximum number of iterations, defaults to N_IT_VAR

  • lr (float, optional) – gradient descent learning rate, defaults to LR_VAR

Returns:

U and V cyclogeostrophic velocities

Return type:

Tuple[np.ndarray, np.ndarray]

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.EPSILON_IT = 0.0001¶

Default residual tolerance of the iterative approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.LR_VAR = 0.005¶

Default learning rate for the gradient descent of the variational approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.N_IT_IT = 100¶

Default maximum number of iterations for the iterative approach

jaxparrow.cyclogeostrophy.N_IT_VAR = 2000¶

Default maximum number of iterations for the variational approach

jaxparrow
